pageContext.claim: “If Republicans are going to pass great future legislation in the Senate, they must immediately go to a 51 vote majority, not senseless 60...Even though parts of healthcare could pass at 51, some really good things need 60. So many great future bills & budgets need 60 votes”
pageContext.analysis: The Senate was already working through the reconciliation process, which requires a 51-vote majority, to pass the Obamacare repeal and replace bill.
